title: Did an Infectious Disease Specialist Write ‘I Am Not Scared of COVID-19’?
subtitle: Readers inquired about a viral Facebook post amid an outbreak of the new coronavirus in 2020.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Dr. Abdu Sharkawy, an infectious diseases specialist, penned a viral Facebook post warning about the loss of reason in the face of panic over the new coronavirus in 2020.
